column1: Baby Barnaby's////Green eggs dish - the eggs aren't overcooked and are creamy. The apple sausage is an great complement
column2: with a slightly sweet taste. The potatoes come very crispy with just enough seasoning. This is a fantastic dish that I can't get anywhere else. Good coffee. Good freshly squeezed juice. There are some healthy options as well
column3: but definitely get the green eggs dish if this is your first time here for brunch. Great atmosphere.
